thread.title: How DraftKings, FanDuel tore down wall between sports, gambling
thread.title_full: How DraftKings, FanDuel tore down wall between sports, gambling - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: How DraftKings, FanDuel tore down wall between sports, gambling
text:
Photo: Stephan Savoia, Associated Press Len Don Diego, marketing manager for content at DraftKings, works at his station at the company's offices in Boston in September 2015.
Len Don Diego, marketing manager for content at DraftKings, works...
Since the Black Sox scandal nearly wrecked baseball 96 years ago, U.S. sports leagues have aggressively fought the slightest hint of gambling interests spoiling the integrity of their games. Len Don Diego, marketing manager for content at DraftKings, works at his station at the company's offices in Boston in September 2015.
